statements: DELETE FROM BiodiversityAreas WHERE area_id = 100 AND region = 'Amazon';
DELETE FROM BiodiversityAreas WHERE biodiversity_index <= 0.5 OR area_name = 'Forest Area';
DELETE FROM SpeciesData WHERE species_name = 'Polar Bear' AND area_id IN (SELECT id FROM BiodiversityAreas WHERE area_name = 'Arctic Circle')
DELETE FROM species WHERE scientific_name='Canis lupus';
DELETE FROM species WHERE area_id IN (SELECT area_id FROM areas WHERE biodiversity_score < 5);
DELETE FROM conservation_plans WHERE plan_id = 100 AND area_id = 5;
DELETE FROM area_species WHERE area_id = 1 AND species_id = 3;
DELETE FROM area_threats WHERE area_id = 2 AND threat_id = 4;
